trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle drag-and-drop routed events, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un metodo che gestirà gli eventi indirizzati di trascinamento e rilascio, ad esempio <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Questo delegato è utilizzato con i seguenti eventi associati.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>Questo delegato è utilizzato anche con i seguenti eventi indirizzati per elementi di base.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questi eventi indirizzati inoltrano gli eventi associati elencati in precedenza per renderli più accessibile per il modello di elemento generale in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName>Gli eventi associati e gli eventi indirizzati dell'elemento base condividono i propri dati di evento e bubbling e tunneling versioni degli eventi indirizzati anche condividere i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewDragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Drop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Questo può influire sulle caratteristiche gestite dell'evento nel tragitto la route dell'evento.
